projects.title: Enterprise Angular Application
projects.description: A scalable enterprise application built with Angular and TypeScript. Features include real-time data synchronization, advanced state management with NgRx, comprehensive testing suite, and responsive design. The application handles complex business logic while maintaining clean architecture and code quality. Implemented lazy loading, route guards, and custom directives for optimal performance.

projects.title: Modern Next.js Portfolio & Blog
projects.description: A high-performance portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features include server-side rendering, static site generation, blog functionality with MDX, dark mode support, and optimized images. The site achieves excellent Lighthouse scores and provides a seamless user experience across all devices.

projects.title: RESTful API with Node.js & TypeScript
projects.description: A robust RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and TypeScript. Features include JWT authentication, role-based access control, comprehensive error handling, database migrations, and API documentation with Swagger. The backend supports real-time features with WebSockets and integrates with multiple third-party services.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Platform
projects.description: A full-stack TypeScript application enabling real-time collaboration. Built with Angular on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, featuring WebSocket integration for live updates, file uploads, user management, and collaborative editing. Implements proper error boundaries, optimistic UI updates, and offline support.
